description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is not more than 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the sixteenth course of Master the Fundamentals of Bernina Embroidery Software 7.

  • Introduce you to the Monogram Digitize Tool in the toolbar
  • Names or initials can be created with combination of frames and backgrounds.
  • Add some designs for an even more personal look.
  • Add ornaments to enhance the frame around the Monogram Letters
  • Create a background behind the letters to work well on all types of fabrics
  • Color management and final outlay tweaking.
  • Summary of this Monogram project to prevent bad stitch outs.

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 40 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.
title: #23 Bernina Software 7 Fundamentals:  Monograms
